snippet: The president and interim prime minister have been released from detention after a coup put Gen. Gilbert Diendéré in charge.
abstract: Burkina Faso military junta releases interim president Michel Kafando and Prime Min Isaac Zida from detention and reopens country's borders; leaders were ousted by military coup that put Gen Gilbert Diendere, ally of former president Blaise Compaore, in charge.
lead_paragraph: The president and interim prime minister have been released from detention after a coup put Gen. Gilbert Diendéré in charge.

headline.main: Burkina Faso Military Says Ousted Leaders Have Been Released
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Burkina Faso: Ousted Leaders Released, Junta Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
